title: Plastic and impractical
content: Every time I try to use it I'm getting hurt. Not practical applicator at all. You promote these new ones and you suspend the cardboard. That's not good P&G. You don't think about us and you don't think of environment. I'm sorry but in case I will not find cardboard in the market I promise to stop buying all P&G products. At the moment I'm buying as many cardboard I can find until you will give us the chance to choose. It's up to you to enforce the availability of cardboard. I would have given zero if I could. The worst product update ever.
